thread.section_title: Goway Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goway Travel | goway.com
thread.title: Leslie Elliot
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Leslie Elliot

author: Leslie Elliot
title: Leslie Elliot
text:
Our trip was very enjoyable, the service was excellent except for a couple of the hotels that we stayed in. The rooms were clean but staff was not as accommodating . Over all though we really appreciated our drivers and guides, all were very helpful and friendly. We did run into issues with ATM's not being accessible to U.S. funds in Costa Rica. Credit cards are always accepted, but if using cash, I would bring what you need with you.
We would definitely recommend Goway to friends and family, they take the guesswork out of a trip.
